Mastering LCZ4r General Functions in QGIS

Max Anjos

August 28, 2025

Source: vignettes/Introd_QGIS_LCZ4r_general.Rmd
Introd_QGIS_LCZ4r_general.Rmd

Introduction

The LCZ4rGeneral Functions are designed to facilitate the retrieval, analysis, and visualization of Local Climate Zones (LCZ) when LCZ related data is not readily available. These functions enable users to download LCZ maps, compute LCZ classes, and extract specific parameters of interest, such as Sky View Factor (SVF), impervious surface fraction, and roughness element height.

You can watch a detailed tutorial on LCZ4r General functions (EN) in QGIS below:

Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions or suggestions by emailing maxanjos@campus.ul.pt. If you are interested in contributing to the development of this LCZ4r-QGIS plugin, we welcome you to join our team.
